Text: Thanks for this. Ever since Demonoid shut down I was wondering who'd pick up the comics slack. Amazing work.
Thanks.This is one I'm gonna have to buy the hardcopy. Harvey's breathin' down our necks for his cash still you know!

You're both most welcome!

claudefunston, it's a BEAUTIFUL book! Might be the most well designed and manufactured Pekar book I've ever held in my hands. Highly recommend owning a physical copy of this one.
